text: Edoardo Casciano (born 9 January 1936) is an Italian former sports shooter. He competed in the trap event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Italy Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Edoardo Casciano
